Hi,

As this subject is not related to the guidance provided by Prism, you might find better support about this in the Silverlight/WPF forums.

For more information on what is covered by Prism's guidance, you might find the introductory chapter in the Prism MSDN documentation useful.

Thanks,

Guido Leandro Maliandi
